snippet: The widening scandal threatens to tarnish the reputation of Gen. John R. Allen, the top American commander in Afghanistan, as The New York Times's Eric Schmitt and Elisabeth Bumiller report.
abstract: The widening scandal threatens to tarnish the reputation of Gen. John R. Allen, the top American commander in Afghanistan, as The New York Times's Eric Schmitt and Elisabeth Bumiller report.

headline.main: Top U.S. General Is Ensnared in Petraeus Inquiry
